alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 2:21AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Northern Big Horn, Treasure, Northern Rosebud and Southern Rosebud. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may cause tree and power line damage resulting in power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...During periods of snow, blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Watch for falling debris, tree limbs and downed power lines. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Rosebud; Treasure
